pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evaluation of Presence-Absence Models // Collection of functions to evaluate presence-absence models. It comprises functions to adjust discrimination statistics for the representativeness effect through case-weighting, along with functions for visualizing the outcomes. Originally outlined in: Jimnez- Valverde (2022) The uniform AUC: dealing with the representativeness effect in presence-absence models. Methods Ecol. Evol, 13, 1224-1236.
